entry.title: Tuesday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 29 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 21. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Tuesday 10 January 2023
